Title: roundDuration
Description: Accepts a number. If the number is less than one, it returns 0. Otherwise, it rounds the number down to numbers from the set of commonly used durations: 1, 10, 30, 60, 120, 180, 240, 300, 600, 1200, 1800, 3600, 7200, 18000, 36000.
num: A number to round to one of the numbers in the set of common durations. UInt/Float.
Examples: SELECT *, roundDuration(*) FROM system.numbers WHERE number IN (0, 9, 19, 47, 101, 149, 205, 271, 421, 789, 1423, 2345, 4567, 9876, 24680, 42573)
